statements: SELECT * FROM kyc_regulations;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM kyc_regulations WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM kyc_regulations WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM kyc_regulations WHERE identification_number LIKE 'AB%';
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM kyc_regulations WHERE transaction_amount < 5000;
SELECT full_name, address, transaction_amount FROM kyc_regulations WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM kyc_regulations ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, identification_number FROM kyc_regulations WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM kyc_regulations WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_transaction FROM kyc_regulations WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM KYC_Customers;
SELECT customer_name, date_of_birth FROM KYC_Customers WHERE kyc_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM Transaction_Logs WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, sender_id, receiver_id FROM Transaction_Logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM KYC_Customers WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM KYC_Customers WHERE kyc_status = 'verified';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, date_of_birth FROM KYC_Customers WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, address FROM KYC_Customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transaction_Logs WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT timestamp, sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM Transaction_Logs WHERE status = 'success' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM KYC_Users;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM KYC_Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Transaction_History ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, address FROM KYC_Users WHERE government_id LIKE 'A%';
SELECT transaction_id, report_reason FROM Suspicious_Activity ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, date_of_birth, address, government_id FROM KYC_Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, address FROM KYC_Users WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1999-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Transaction_History WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suspicious_Activity WHERE report_reason LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT TH.*, KYC.full_name FROM Transaction_History TH JOIN KYC_Users KYC ON TH.user_id = KYC.user_id WHERE TH.amount < 500 AND KYC.address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, alert_type, creation_date FROM alerts ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS highest_amount, MIN(amount) AS lowest_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, alert_type, status FROM alerts WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_information;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, address FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT identification_type, identification_number FROM customer_information WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, address FROM customer_information ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM customer_information WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, address FROM customer_information ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' AND transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, customer_id, balance FROM account_balance WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance DESC;
